TopicTitle: A way to make your bases "level" ?

Articles.Content:
Hello all,

I have a question. Is there a mod that will allow you to make your bases level? Example: Nice and level when built on Minmus on the flats. Perhaps a way to make with legs to level themselves out or a mod to allow a kerbal to flaten out an area for building? Done some searching and I haven't seen anything like this. Not even sure if this is possible. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Thanks!
I made a request for self-leveling landing struts a while ago. You could use Infernal Robotics parts to make such adjustments manually, but I know of nothing yet that's intended for the purpose.

There was a mod that had 2 landing legs that you could level but can't fined the thread it has it's own plugin, I have the mod will keep looking for the thread.

EDIT- Looks like the author was Zitron

EDIT- It's old and haven't tried it in .90 but here is the thread [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/39650-0-22-Shock-absorbing-landing-legs-V1-2-%2821-11-2013%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/39650-0-22-Shock-absorbing-landing-legs-V1-2-%2821-11-2013%29)
